ratings.comment: GB 300 is a horrible class, but Laurel made it bearable. She was positive and offered valuable feedback on all my assigned work. She was always available for out of class help. She was a fair grader and I would definitely take another class with her.

I had Laurel for GB300 which is why I chose to take INTLBUS320 with her. I got A's in both. In this class, there is a good amount of busy work but it is all very easy (weekly 4 point quizzes and reflections). You have to do a solo presentation, group presentation, and a short final report. No exams. Class time is all group discussion; no lectures.

First of all, this is the most useless course I've ever taken. Those reading need to take this online. Laurel is incredibly annoying and gives the most unclear instructions it's almost unbelievable. Also your typical social justice warrior type and talks down to you like a child.

Class has long reading every other day, usually quizzed on or need to write a reflection. Group discussions during class. The class drags on forever and she treats you like kindergarteners. More work than expected but grades fairly easy.

Laurel is a great professor and does her best to ensure that students know her clear expectations and how grading will work. This class demands many outside hours of work, but she prepares you the best for your final investigative report.

I thought this course was very easy. Laurel makes it really easy to do well on the assignments. You work in groups every class/she barely lectures. You have multiple small busy work assignments due each week, but very doable. I thought Laurel was very nice and really cared about her students.
300 is a lot of work with whatever professor you have. Laurel will make sure you do well on final portfolio (Graded by other 300 professors) and will make class as good as it can be.

Really nice professor, but sometimes she talks to you like you're 5 years old. The class itself is a ton of busy work regardless of what professor you have, but she's usually pretty helpful if you meet with with her one on one if you have questions about anything.
Laurel is a great teacher and really cares that you understand the material. The class itself is a lot of busy work but since you have to take it, try to get Laurel.
